FeeTooHigh(uint256).notice: The swap fee is over the maximum allowed
The swap fee is over the maximum allowed

userdoc.notice: A router for any Uniswap V3 fork The pools are not trusted to deliver the correct amount of tokens, so the router verifies this. The pool addresses passed in as a parameter instead of being looked up from the factory. The caller may use `getPair` on the factory to calculate pool addresses.
